nodes.label: Social, Ethical and Professional topics
nodes.title: Social, Ethical and Professional topics: include considerations of privacy, security, accessibility, and ethical implications of technology use and development.

nodes.label: Open source in operating systems
nodes.title: Open source in operating systems: involves collaborative development and sharing of source code, fostering innovation, transparency, and community-driven software development.

nodes.label: Protection and Safety
nodes.title: Protection and Safety: involve measures to safeguard against unauthorized access, data breaches, and system compromises.

nodes.label: Security Policies, Laws and Computer Crimes

nodes.label: Intellectual Property
nodes.title: Intellectual Property: refers to legal rights protecting creations of the mind

nodes.label: Foundations of the open source movement
nodes.title: Foundations of the open source movement: promote collaboration, transparency, and the sharing of intellectual property through open licenses
